1047710.name: Shipped Soundtrack
1047710.description:
Shipped's original soundtrack, composed by Alejandro Maciá, in collaboration with Iván Gregorio.

Includes 21 mp3 tracks:

· 01 - Ten steps to the chest (trailer version)
· 02 - The chest, the pirates and ... cookies!
· 03 - Eight little pirates
· 04 - Reaching the ocean
· 05 - Ten steps to the chest
· 06 - Sailing and sailing
· 07 - Perseverance
· 08 - Seagulls on shipboard!
· 09 - Avoiding the cannonballs
· 10 - Timed virage
· 11 - Favorable wind
· 12 - Oar in hand
· 13 - For the glory, for the cookies
· 14 - The end
· 15 - Ten steps to the chest (new trailer version)
· 16 - Eight little pirates (extended)
· 17 - Row row row!!
· 18 - Through the waves
· 19 - Pirate's little crate
· 20 - Hoist the sails!
· 21 - Drifting upwind
